name: Dark Past (Bardon)
description:
You are a detective and must solve this case: In a small village in a game-studio a story-writer was killed. Find out who it was!

Maybe you must travel in the past. Talk with the people there. When a important person doesn't say something you must first go to another person and find out a hint. Later you can go back to the important person and with the hint he says you something which might help you.
